resources.string: WLAN Hotspot
WLAN tethering
Portable WLAN Hotspot
"Portable WLAN Hotspot can share this phone's 3G Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
After the Portable WLAN Hotspot is started on this phone, your PC can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
"WLAN tethering can share this phone's Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
After the WLAN tethering is started on this phone, your PC can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
"Mobile Hotspot can share this phone's 3G Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
"Sprint Mobile Hotspot can share this phone's 3G/4G Internet connection with your device via WLAN."
"%s allows you to instantly create a fast WLAN connection using T-Mobile's advanced data network."
"PocketWifi™ can share this phone's 3G Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
1. Turn on WLAN on your PC.
1. Enable WLAN on the device you want to connect to your Sprint Mobile Hotspot.
2. Find \"%s\" in the list of WLAN networks.
3. Select \"%s\" in the list of WLAN networks and enter \"%s\" in the security field.
3. Select \"%s.\" in the list of WLAN networks.
Starting WLAN tethering...
WLAN channel
Starting a WLAN hotspot or Internet sharing connection will interrupt ongoing sending or receiving of MMS messages. Would you like to continue?
WLAN is currently active. WLAN and Mobile Hotspot cannot run at the same time. WLAN will be turned off.
Introduction for Portable WLAN Hotspot

"Portable WLAN hotspot allows your Android-powered device to be used as a mobile hotspot for up to five devices using your phone’s data connection. If using this service, you should secure the connection to deny unauthorized access. This service consumes battery power and increases your data usage. This service requires a subscription to the applicable modem plan. Please ensure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Call 1-877-872-2249 if you need assistance. Use of service constitutes acceptance of the "Smartphone Modem Terms.
"Mobile Hotspot can share this phone's 4G Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
"Portable WLAN Hotspot can share this phone's 3G/WiBro 4G Internet connection with your PC via WLAN."
